long_description: More than just great shorts, the women's Giro Mobility Bike Overshorts are made with enough stretch to let you move freely on the bike, off the bike and wherever you want to roam. Polyester/cotton/spandex 4-way-stretch twill. Contoured waistband fits comfortably. Can be worn over cycling undershorts with a chamois (such as the women's Novara Padded Bike Boy Short Underwear, sold separately) for added riding comfort. Pockets: 2 front, 2 rear. Giro Mobility Bike Overshorts for women have a 5-in. inseam.
short_description: More than just great shorts, the women's Giro Mobility Bike Overshorts are made with enough stretch to let you move freely on the bike, off the bike and wherever you want to roam.
